text: Mehdi Hashemi is an Iranian actor, screenwriter and director born on 7 December, 1946 Langarud, Iran. He also is the winner of the ninth International Fajr Movie Festival award, Crystal Simorgh, for his playing in the movie One Ticket, Two Movies! He has also played the lead role in series Dar Jostejoye Aramesh and Golshifteh. He is the husband of Iranian actress, Golab Adineh, and brother of Nasser Hashemi. ==References== * Category:Iranian actors Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Mehdi Hashemi
